short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best AI chatbot for answer questions about your business. Right there in a popup when you need it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A business chatbot whose goal is to provide relevant answers on any business-related topic, with accuracy, through fine-tuning a curated business knowledge base. You can ask any business-related question to the bot, and it will answer promptly, suggesting links and resources, and additional questions, so you can get a complete understanding of a topic!
